title: How does one know if they can vote in the upcoming wilmington municipal election (if one lives in new hanover county but are unsure whether they live in the city limits)?
text:
The New Hanover County Board of Elections runs elections for
municipalities in the county. For information on voting districts and
eligibility. Here's a link and phone number:



http://www.nhcgov.com/agnanddpt/elct/Pages/DeptInfo.aspx

(910)798-7330
